title: Destroyer of Worlds--- Demon King (Champion Concept)
body:
The Demon King is a mighty beast that is absolutely overpowered as long as he is able to channel his spells. He is a melee caster that deals Magic damage in spells that scales off AD and can finish off his targets using his ultimate: Demon King- Soul Tear

HP 613.2 +83.2 3.89/5sec +0.90
MP 412.8 +51.8 4.11/5sec +0.72
AD 54.7 +4.81
Atk Speed 0.710 +0.014
Armor 21.1 +1
MR 11.4 +2.13
Speed 340


Passive: Influence of Fear
The Demon King reduces the Armor and MR of nearby units by 4/6/8/10 as well as 4/6/8/10%.

Q: Following Fear 85/90/95/100/110mp 17/16.4/15.8/15.2/14.6sec
Creates an area of 375 Radius or dark energy while channeling for 3 seconds, it follows where the mouse is.
 Enemies inside are Silenced and take 40/55/70/85/100%AD+30/50/80/120/170 Magic Damage every second and gains a stack of Horror.
Upon reaching 3 stacks of horror, the enemy is rooted for 1/1.5/2/2.5/3 seconds and take an additional 200%AD+60/120/200/300/420 Magic Damage.

At Rank 5, if the enemy is rooted, the damage is increased to 250%AD+90/180/300/450/630 Magic Damage.

W: Dark Energy Burst 90/100/110/120/130mp 24/22.75/21.5/20.25/19sec
Channels for 1.75 seconds. Folding his wings back, he gains a barrier that blocks up to 1/2/2/3/3 spells and gives 30/40/50/60/70 Armor and MR.
After the channel is complete, he will let out a huge burst of shadow energies to nearby enemies, Dealing 160%AD + 120/160/200/240/280 Magic Damage over 4 seconds. The enemies are also slowed by a decaying slow of 99% over 4 seconds.

At Rank 5, the enemies hit also loose effects from positive buffs and prevents receiving positive buffs for 10 seconds but the duration of De-Buffs are increased by 50%

E: Claws Of Death No Cooldown
Toggle to use 55/60/65/70/75MP +1.25% Max MP so that each basic attack gains 75 range. Each attack also lowers the enemies AD, AP, HP regen, Attack speed, Movement speed, Armor and Magic Resist by 2/2.5/3/3.5/4%. Up to 10 times.

 At Rank 5, the 1.25% Max MP cost is REMOVED.

R: Demon King- Soul Tear. 220/200/180 sec  350MP
Channels for 1.25 seconds before Creates a field of tombs in an area of 550 units around him. In The field all minions and terrain are pushed away out of the field as well as every champion apart from the selected enemy champion. Inside, all units apart from the DEMON-KING is silenced, he channels for another 4 seconds before unleashing a HUGE Purple orb of Death Energy that moves slowly at a speed of 275 towards 1 Selected enemy champion, it can be blocked by another enemy champion by standing in front of it. It Deals 175/200/225%AD +300/500/700 TRUE DAMAGE to the enemy.  
If the enemy is killed instantly, the Ability Permenently gains a 1.25%MAX hp bonus True Damage and the cooldown is reduced by 75 seconds and refunds 200MP.

. The enemies can come inside via flash or teleport but cannot dash, jump or in Red'Sai case "DIG" into the zone. Enemies outside may be able to cast spells to stop his channel.
